item.title: 路透社报道：中金公司将把投资银行家的基本工资削减 25
item.description: 据路透社报道，中国国际金融有限公司（China International Capital Corp.【原文：China International Capital Corp. is slashing onshore investment bankers’ base salary by as much as 25% to trim costs, according to Reuters.】

item.title: 中国成都市放宽购房规定以恢复销售
item.description: 中国西南部大城市成都取消了购房限制，与全国数十个城市一道，试图重振房地产需求，促进经济增长。【原文：Chengdu, a major city in the southwest China, removed home-buying curbs, joining dozens of peers in the country in an attempt to revive real estate demand and boost economic growth.】

item.title: 日元贬值加速，日本何去何从？
item.description: 日元的暴跌已经远远超过了被吹捧为日本红线的水平，其下跌速度之快让交易员们不禁要问，政府何时才会开始购买日元来支持它？【原文：The yen has tumbled well past levels touted as red lines for Japan and at a pace that has traders asking when authorities might start buying the currency to support it — and why they haven’t already done so.】

item.title: 马斯克宣布访华，推动自动驾驶汽车发展
item.description: 特斯拉公司（Tesla Inc.据熟悉内情的人士透露，特斯拉公司首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）正在对中国进行一次未事先宣布的访问，预计将与中国官员会面，讨论全自动驾驶软件的推广问题。【原文：Tesla Inc. Chief Executive Officer Elon Musk is on an unannounced trip to China and expected to meet officials to discuss the rollout of its Full Self-Driving software, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 菲律宾首都高温打破 1915 年纪录，学校停课
item.description: 菲律宾将于周一和周二停止公立学校的面授课程，因为气温不断升高，周末首都马尼拉的气温达到了创纪录的水平。【原文：The Philippines will halt in-person classes at public schools on Monday and Tuesday amid rising temperatures that reached a record in the capital Manila over the weekend.】

item.title: 万科以股东支持为由抨击穆迪下调评级
item.description: 中国万科集团上周罕见地对穆迪下调其评级做出回应，称得到了金融机构及其最大股东的支持。【原文：China Vanke Co. made a rare response to Moody’s downgrade last week, citing support from financial institutions and its biggest shareholder.】

item.title: 泰国电力需求创纪录，酷热引发警告
item.description: 周六，泰国全国气温飙升，用电量创下历史新高，在与高温有关的死亡人数不断上升的情况下，泰国当局一再发出健康警告。【原文：Thailand’s power usage surged to a record on Saturday as temperatures soared across the country, prompting authorities to repeatedly issue health warnings amid a rising heat-related death toll.】

item.title: 亿万富翁安德烈-古里耶夫（Andrey Guryev）因 PhosAgro 股份问题与老朋友在英国法庭发生冲突
item.description: 被制裁的俄罗斯亿万富翁安德烈-古里耶夫（Andrey Guryev）与一位朋友因争夺世界最大化肥生产商之一的股份而闹得不可开交，这起伦敦纠纷涉及苏联解体后达成的所谓交易和喝啤酒时许下的承诺。【原文：Sanctioned Russian billionaire Andrey Guryev’s fallout with a friend over a stake in one of the world’s largest fertilizer producers has been laid bare in a London dispute that rakes over alleged deals struck after the fall of the Soviet Union and promises made over a beer.】

item.title: 中国南方大都市广州的龙卷风造成五人死亡
item.description: 据官方新华社报道，一场强烈的龙卷风周六在中国最大的经济中心之一广州市肆虐，造成 5 人死亡，33 人受伤。【原文：A strong tornado wreaked havoc through the city of Guangzhou, one of China’s biggest economic hubs, on Saturday, killing five people and injuring 33, according to a report by the official Xinhua News Agency.】

item.title: 泰国任命资本市场资深人士皮查伊为财务总监
item.description: 泰国总理沙威信任命资本市场资深人士披差-春哈瓦吉拉（Pichai Chunhavajira）为泰国新任财政部长，这一任命可能会缓解总理与央行在货币政策上的紧张关系。【原文：Prime Minister Srettha Thavisin named capital markets veteran Pichai Chunhavajira as Thailand’s new finance minister in an appointment that may ease tensions between the premier and the central bank over monetary policy.】

item.title: 德国考虑缩减对中国投资的审查：华尔街日报
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》报道，德国正在考虑缩减政府加强对中国投资审查的计划。【原文：Germany is considering scaling back plans to ramp up government screening of Chinese investments, the Wall Street Journal reported.】

item.title: 下一个美国液化天然气出口工厂计划于 2024 年年中投产
item.description: Venture Global LNG 公司预计将于 2024 年中期在路易斯安那州的第二个液化天然气出口设施投产，进一步巩固美国作为全球最大的超冷燃料供应国的地位。【原文：Venture Global LNG Inc. expects to begin production at its second liquefied natural gas export facility in Louisiana in mid-2024, further cementing to the US as the world’s biggest supplier of the super-chilled fuel.】

item.title: 美联储重新定价催生亚洲股市新玩法
item.description: 长期利率走高的环境正在为廉价的中国股票增光添彩，并推动着亚洲的价值投资策略。【原文：A higher-for-longer interest rate environment is burnishing the credentials of cheap Chinese stocks and driving value investment strategies in Asia.】

item.title: 鲍威尔有望让美联储继续走 "长期走高 "之路
item.description: 投资者将密切关注杰罗姆-鲍威尔未来一周的讲话，从中寻找美联储愿意在降息前等待多久的线索。【原文：Jerome Powell’s remarks in the coming week will be closely parsed by investors for any clues on just how long the Federal Reserve is willing to wait before cutting interest rates.】

item.title: 塞拉利昂首都在支付了卡波维奇款项后恢复供电
item.description: 塞拉利昂说，它结清了拖欠卡普瑞公司的部分账单，以便在停电数周后恢复首都的电力供应。【原文：Sierra Leone said it settled part of a bill owed to Karpowership to restore power to the capital after weeks of electricity cuts.】

item.title: 投标被拒后，必和必拓将考虑盎格鲁集团的改进方案
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，必和必拓集团正在考虑对英美资源集团（Anglo American PLC）提出一个更好的收购方案，因为必和必拓集团提出的 390 亿美元的初步收购方案遭到了这家在伦敦上市的矿业公司的拒绝。【原文：BHP Group is considering making an improved proposal for Anglo American PLC after its $39 billion initial offer was rejected by the London-listed miner, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 肯尼亚总统鲁托称赞津巴布韦的 ZiG 法案促进了经济前景
item.description: 肯尼亚总统威廉-鲁托称赞津巴布韦的黄金支持货币是南部非洲国家经济复苏的潜在动力。【原文：Kenyan President William Ruto hailed Zimbabwe’s gold-backed currency as a potential driver of economic recovery in the southern African nation.】

item.title: 新海峡时报》称云顶集团否认柔佛州赌场谈判报道
item.description: 据《新海峡时报》援引云顶马来西亚有限公司的一份声明报道，该公司表示没有参与在马来西亚柔佛州森林城市开发项目中开设赌场的谈判。【原文：Genting Malaysia Bhd. said it wasn’t involved in talks about opening a casino in the Forest City development in the Malaysian state of Johor, the New Straits Times reported, citing a statement from the company.】

item.title: 俄罗斯将强制外汇销售期限延长至 2025 年 4 月
item.description: 俄罗斯将主要出口商的强制外汇销售期限延长了一年，政府称这一决定将有助于保持卢布的稳定。【原文：Russia has extended mandatory FX sales for major exporters by one year, a decision the government said will help to maintain a stable ruble.】

item.title: 德克萨斯州的电价预示着电网在又一个漫长炎热的夏季将面临压力
item.description: 德克萨斯州 8 月份的电价飙升表明，为满足空调需求，今年夏天的用电需求又将十分旺盛，电网可能出现紧张。【原文：A surge in Texas power prices for August suggests another summer of heavy electricity demand — and potential grid strain — to meet air-conditioning needs.】

item.title: 埃克森和雪佛龙在全球最热油区产量激增
item.description: 如果你想了解为什么美国最大的两家石油公司现在在并购上的花费加起来超过了 1,000 亿美元，那就看看它们从地球上最热的两个油田开采出的原油数量吧。【原文：If you want to understand why the two largest US oil companies are together spending in excess of $100 billion on acquisitions right now, look no further than the amount of crude they’re extracting from the two hottest oil fields on the planet.】

item.title: 利润反弹为 S&P 公司的 "风险至上 "势头注入新动力
item.description: 季度报告季已过半，尽管宏观经济的不利因素依然存在，但美国企业的盈利基本达到了华尔街的乐观预期。【原文：With the quarterly reporting season roughly half over, US corporate earnings have largely lived up to Wall Street’s optimistic expectations even as macroeconomic headwinds linger.】

item.description:
在不确定的市场中，Computer Trading公司的彼得-博里什（Peter Borish）关注商品的 "七C"

。【原文：

In uncertain markets, Peter Borish of Computer Trading watches the ‘seven Cs’ of commodities

item.title: 俄罗斯和乌克兰就炼油厂和天然气目标互有攻防
item.description: 一夜之间，俄罗斯和乌克兰在能源设施上交火，俄罗斯克拉斯诺达尔地区的一座炼油厂受损，而乌克兰的天然气基础设施和其他目标遭到导弹袭击。【原文：Russia and Ukraine exchanged fire on energy facilities overnight, with an oil refinery damaged in Russia’s Krasnodar region while Ukraine sustained a missile barrage on gas infrastructure and other targets.】

item.title: 德国经济出现复苏迹象，但工业仍在挣扎
item.description: 在经历了两年接近零增长的艰难时期后，德国的经济前景正在好转。不过，消费者主导的经济复苏只是工业持续疲软的一个缩影，并不能一蹴而就。【原文：Germany’s economic prospects are looking up after two grueling years of near-zero growth. The consumer-led revival, though, papers over enduring industrial weakness for which there’s no quick fix.】

item.title: UAW 与戴姆勒卡车公司达成临时协议，避免罢工
item.description: 美国汽车工人联合会（United Auto Workers）表示，在戴姆勒卡车控股公司（Daimler Truck Holding AG）发出罢工威胁后，该组织与戴姆勒卡车控股公司（Daimler Truck Holding AG）在 4 月 26 日午夜合同到期前达成了临时协议。【原文：The United Auto Workers said it reached a tentative agreement with Daimler Truck Holding AG ahead of a contract expiring midnight on April 26 and following a strike threat.】

item.title: 新加坡银行解雇滥用医疗报销的员工：CNA
item.description: 据中新社报道，华侨银行的私人银行分支机构新加坡银行有限公司因滥用医疗福利解雇了多达40名员工。【原文：Bank of Singapore Ltd., the private-banking arm of Oversea-Chinese Banking Corp., has fired up to 40 employees over the misuse of medical benefits, according to a CNA report.】

item.title: 库什纳的 Affinity 公司获得巴西快餐运营商董事会席位
item.description: 贾里德-库什纳（Jared Kushner）的 Affinity Partners 在今年早些时候投资约 2 亿美元后，加入了巴西快餐运营商 Zamp SA 的董事会。【原文：Jared Kushner’s Affinity Partners joined the board of Brazilian fast-food operator Zamp SA after making an investment of about $200 million earlier this year.】

item.title: 海外需求停滞，中国工业利润下降
item.description: 由于出口疲软和通货紧缩压力持续存在，中国工业企业的利润在 3 月份出现下滑，这表明中国经济今年年初强于预期的增长可能难以维持。【原文：China’s industrial companies’ profits fell in March as exports flagged and deflationary pressures persisted, suggesting the economy’s stronger-than-expected growth early this year might be tough to maintain.】

item.title: 新加坡计划制定支持 "临时工 "退休需求的法律
item.description: 新加坡人力部部长陈士令表示，新加坡将在今年出台一项新法律，帮助所谓的 "打工经济 "工人规划退休需求并获得工伤保障。【原文：Singapore will introduce a new law this year that will help so-called gig-economy workers plan for their retirement needs and get work injury protection, Minister for Manpower Tan See Leng said.】
